sentences.sContent: Cut the cabbage into fine long shreds.
sentences.sCn: 把这棵卷心菜切成细长条。

synos.tran: 碎片；少量剩余；最少量；破布

trans.tranCn: 碎片；少量剩余；最少量；破布
trans.tranOther: a small thin piece that is torn or cut roughly from something

trans.tranCn: 切成条状；用碎纸机撕毁
trans.tranOther: to cut or tear something into small thin pieces
